Home How To Courses Answers Search Moe's Southwest Grill Coupons Tweet Moe's Southwest Grill is a Tex-Mex fast food restaurant that serves made-to-order burritos, tacos, quesadillas and nachos. Moe's currently operates over 400 stores in 35 states. This page will provide you the best Moe's Southwest Grill coupons and discounts to save you money on your next visit.
In 2010, Moe's was running the "Thank You Thursday" promotion. Each Thursday during the year, Moe's was offering buy one-get one free on their menu items with the purchase of two large drinks.
Register on Moe's official website and receive special offers and coupons including a free burrito on your birthday.
Moe's Unique Menu Items
Moe's Southwest Grill is not only known for the food items on their menu, but for the names they have given to each item. The food chain has given their menu items unique names based on popular television, movie and pop culture icons. If you are craving a burrito, you can try a Homewrecker, Triple Lindy, Joey Bag of Donuts or a vegetarian Art Vandalay. (Most people remember Art Vandalay as someone George Costanza wanted to be on the television show Seinfeld.) If you are in the mood for a taco, try the Overachiever, Unanimous Decision or The Funk Meister. Other popular menu items include Alfredo Garcia, John Coctostan and the Super Kingpin.
Finding Moe's Southwest Grill Coupons
A great way to get Moe's coupons is by registering on their official website. Registered used are eligible to receive coupons directly from Moe's. These coupons are exclusive to members and are sent as a PDF attachment that you can share with your family, friends and co-workers.
